ygData.subject: Level 30 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Im new to the list , so I dont know if this has been discussed. I ve recently got to level 30 and in reading the Song List v2.0 on the Level 30 song it said it
ygData.messageBody:
Im new to the list , so I dont know if this has been discussed. I've recently got to level 30 and in reading the Song List v2.0 on
the Level 30 song it said it was a DoT which lower magic Resistance as well. But it seems to be a Direct Target song (it has a red
icon like Bellow and Chain) and didnt do any noticeable damage. Is this a MR lowering song only? Anyone tested this song yet?


Thanks,
JackalX
Tunare , Level 30
